tool_description:
Real-time Geolocation &
Reverse IP Lookup REST API
Scalable IP lookup trusted by 30,000+ businesses worldwide
Accurately geolocate users by IPv4 or IPv6 address
Unparalleled in data consistency and response time
title: ipapi

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipapi3.p.rapidapi.com/api.ipapi.com/api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipapi3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
